page.title: 12Mrs.French remembers 1
page.content: { Mrs French}was born in{Shilton}in{ {1903.}She was the eldest of 5 children. She remembers school as being a strict place with frequent canings for such things as lateness and talking in class. The school had about 100 children with 2 assistant teachers and the head teacher. She wrote with a squeaky slate chalk and slate. Conditions in school were quite poor. They left school at 13. She went into domestic work at a nearby house for 12.5p. After World War 1 she worked for a{ribbon weaving firm in{Bulkington.}She used to walk or bike the 2.5 miles every day to {Bulkington.}She arrived at work at {06.15}and finished at{18.00.}In her spare time she used to go on walks, bike rides and go to the local dance every fortnight at the school.
